title: Brix Deluxe
content:
I once had Brix Deluxe (the one with a level editor) around on a floppy disk, but I just can't find it anywhere. It was a really cool game. Does anybody know a place where I can get it?

------------------------------------------------------
Keep in mind, I'm not an artist.
